local_intent: Place white_plate onto red_plate by detecting target, moving above, aligning, lowering until contact, releasing, and retreating.
assumptions: White plate is currently held by the gripper (grasp established earlier)
Red plate pose is detectable from current viewpoint
coherence_with_global: Implements the 'place' phase from the global plan: perceives red_plate, positions above it, performs precise alignment, lowers until contact to ensure gentle placement, opens gripper to release, then retreats and waits.
